attributes.action: Award the divers involved with the cave rescue the George Cross for gallantry
attributes.background: The teams involved demonstrated the highest degree of courage and bravery and carried out the mission to successfully recover the young boys and coach

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
